full_examples.name: Backreference
full_examples.target: "abab" but not "abaab"
full_examples.description: Backreferences enable referring to previously matched groups in later parts of the regex and/or replacement string (where applicable). For instance, ([ab]+)\1 matches "abab" but not "abaab"

full_examples.name: BBCode color
full_examples.target: [color=#FF0000]Hello World ![/color]. Nice [color=#FF0000]color [/color] Isn't it ?
full_examples.description: Replace a BBCode color tag by a html span style

full_examples.name: BBCode email
full_examples.target: This is a test [email]maurice.inzirillo@4dnetcenter.com[/email] This is another
full_examples.description: Convert the BBCode tag [email] by the HTML tag.

full_examples.name: Code 4D
full_examples.target: CREER SUR LIEN CREER test
full_examples.description: Replace html tag with a bbcode tag

full_examples.name: comma
full_examples.description: Replace comma with Tab

full_examples.name: Comma
full_examples.description: Separator is a comma or a comma with one or more space.

full_examples.name: CSV
full_examples.target:
aaa,b b,"""c"" cc"
1,,"333","12,45,45",three,
still more threes
full_examples.description:
Comma-Separated Values (CSV)
CSV is an old but still very common file format used for spreadsheet-like data. The CSV format is supported by most spreadsheets and database management systems, and is especially popular for exchanging data between applications. Although there is no official CSV specification, an attempt at a common definition was published in October 2005 as RFC 4180 and registered with IANA as MIME type “text/csv.” Before this RFC was published, the CSV conventions used by Microsoft Excel had been established as more or less a de facto standard.

full_examples.name: CSV - Extract
full_examples.target:
aaa,b b,"""c"" cc"
1,,"333","12,45,45",three,
still more threes
full_examples.description:
Comma-Separated Values (CSV)
CSV is an old but still very common file format used for spreadsheet-like data. The CSV format is supported by most spreadsheets and database management systems, and is especially popular for exchanging data between applications. Although there is no official CSV specification, an attempt at a common definition was published in October 2005 as RFC 4180 and registered with IANA as MIME type “text/csv.” Before this RFC was published, the CSV conventions used by Microsoft Excel had been established as more or less a de facto standard.

full_examples.name: CSV - Extract - 2
full_examples.target: numOrdre,noDeclaration,refdansvente,libelle,estimation,estimationHaute1,a5328,1,"Petit Okimono représentant une petite jeune fille en bois de cerf, époque 1860 H 5,5",150,2002,a5328,2,Meissen """dans le goût""" trois statuettes en porcelaine polychrome et or représentant des enfants ailés musiciens H : 11 cm,120,1803,a5328,4,"Charmant éventail en écaille décoré de pastilles en métal et de motifs dorés,lien de tissu usé,manques aux pastilles,très léger manque à écaille vers 1860 H: 17, 5 cm",80,100
full_examples.description:
Comma-Separated Values (CSV)
CSV is an old but still very common file format used for spreadsheet-like data. The CSV format is supported by most spreadsheets and database management systems, and is especially popular for exchanging data between applications. Although there is no official CSV specification, an attempt at a common definition was published in October 2005 as RFC 4180 and registered with IANA as MIME type “text/csv.” Before this RFC was published, the CSV conventions used by Microsoft Excel had been established as more or less a de facto standard.

full_examples.name: Decimal
full_examples.target: Le total 2887.98 n'inclut pas la somme de 3'988,78. Le capital est donc de 89,098.45. La date de sortie de 4D 2004.2Beta4  sera le 23 avril 2004. 2333 1 25 45
full_examples.description: This rule accepts apostrophe, period and comma as decimal and thousand delimiter.

full_examples.name: Decimal with complex delimiter
full_examples.target: Le total 2887.98 n'inclut pas la somme de 3'988,78. Le capital est donc de 89,098.45. La date de sortie de 4D 2004.2Beta4  sera le 23 avril 2004. 2333 1 25 45
full_examples.description: This rule accept word, comma apostrophe and period as a decimal and thousand delimiter.

full_examples.name: Dutch/Netherlands Postal Code
full_examples.description: Postal codes of the form 'DDDD LL', with F, I, O, Q, U and Y not used, SA, SD and SS unused combinations, and the first digit cannot be 0. No specific meaning to the letters or digits.

full_examples.name: E-mail parsing
full_examples.target:
In this sentence there is an email address info@4dnetcenter.com and another one maurice.inzirillo@4dnetcenter.com which is mine.

This is another e-mail which is more sophisticated info.tech.global@4d.com.uk
full_examples.description:
Use this version to seek out email addresses in random documents and texts.
Does not match email addresses using an IP address instead of a domain name.
Does not match email addresses on new-fangled top-level domains with more than 4 letters such as .museum.  Including these increases the risk of false positives when applying the regex to random documents.

full_examples.description:
Use this version to seek out email addresses in random documents and texts.
Does not match email addresses using an IP address instead of a domain name. 
Both the local part and the domain name contain one or more dots, but not two dots can appear right next to each other. Furthermore, the first and the last characters in the local part and in the domain name must not be dots.

full_examples.name: Extract links
full_examples.target:
4D NET Center was been founded by 4D SA, developer and publisher of the 4D product line, and its Swiss Distributor AJAR SA.

4D NET Center is also, since May 2005, the editor of the eCommerce solution 4D Business Kit.

The hosting center has a capacity for up to 100 CPUs and is fully managed by 4D NET Center personnel:

Maurice Inzirillo: e-mail
Technical Engineer, sales for French and Italian speaking customers.

Marco Rothen: e-mail
Administration and sales for German and English speaking customers.

Myriam Costantino: e-mail
Accounting

The infrastructure of the hosting center - located in Biel, Switzerland - responds to today's requirements for security and availability: Internet connection to two different carriers (VTX and Via Networks) with two separate leased lines, modern routers that guarantee a minimum level of available bandwidth at all times, security and fire protection-devices, an industrial UPS system, a comprehensive backup system... everything needed to ensure the greatest possible reliability for all of the servers.

About 4D SA

Founded in 1984 in Paris, 4D (formerly ACI) is wholly owned by its original founders. 4D SA develops and publishes a set of development, database and server solutions for the Internet and Intranet. 4D counts more than 180 employees distributed in his head offices in CLICHY, its international subsidiaries (United States, Japan, Great Britain, Germany, Sweden) and its distribution network, present in over 40 countries.

The community of 4D developers includes over 7,000 systems houses, VAR, integrators and vertical applications publishers in fields as varied as corporate management, systems integration, Database Publishing, multimedia, health, real estate, banking and independent professions etc.

For further information, consult the 4D web site at: http://www.4D.com

About AJAR SA

Founded in 1993 in Biel, Switzerland, AJAR is wholly owned by its original founders. AJAR SA distributes the 4D product line and third party products for 4D. AJAR does not develop 4D applications or solutions directly. Instead, AJAR refers project requests to qualified partners who develop applications using 4D.

For further information, consult the AJAR web site at: http://www.ajar.ch

4D NET Center
Rue Général Dufour 123
P.O. Box 4326
CH-2500 Bienne 4
Switzerland

Phone +41 32 342 27 32
Fax +41 32 342 31 46

Biel is the most important bilingual city in Switzerland. It forms the linguistic bridge between Switzerland's german-speaking and the french-speaking communities. It lies at the centre of the country, at the southern foot of the Jura, mid-way between Geneva and Zurich.

full_examples.name: Extract release number
full_examples.target:
2330

[b][size=18]Mid-April release of 4D 2004.2 B4 ![/size][/b]

127
Dear Betatesters, 



Last release was crashing randomly on mac (mostly) and windows. These bug have been fixed and B4 should be more reliable.
Tiger compatibility has also been improved in this release.

The new green button in the form editor is now working and allows you to test your forms directly from the design mode (wow !)

3304.76
[b]4D 2004.2 B4[/b] is available through FTP.

[b][size=18]Intl versions[/size][/b]
[url=ftp://ftp-private.4d.fr/betatest/4D2004_Environment/Products/US/PC/]Intl Windows version[/url]
[url=ftp://ftp-private.4d.fr/betatest/4D2004_Environment/Products/US/Mac/]Intl Mac OS X version[/url]
[url=ftp://@ftp-private.4d.fr/betatest/4D2004_Environment/Products/US/PlugIns]Intl Plugins[/url]

[b][size=18]French versions[/size][/b]
[url=ftp://ftp-private.4d.fr/betatest/4D2004_Environment/Products/VF/PC/]VF Windows version[/url]
[url=ftp://ftp-private.4d.fr/betatest/4D2004_Environment/Products/VF/Mac/]VF Mac OS X version[/url]
[url=ftp://ftp-private.4d.fr/betatest/4D2004_Environment/Products/VF/PlugIns]VF Plugins[/url]

First draft of the documentation addendum is also [url=ftp://@ftp-private.4d.fr/betatest/4D2004_Environment/Products/US/4D_2004.2_Addendum.pdf]available here[/url], please carefully read it, some compatibility options have been added to the form options (see page 5) 

[b]Most Significant fixed bugs[/b][list][*][b]4D : [/b]Automatic data segment creation issues have been fixed[*][b]4D & Server :[/b] Boolean field border issue in Custiom menu mode[*][b]4D & Server :[/b]crash may occur while in demo mode (bug link to the new localtion of preference files)[*][b]4D & Server :[/b]Shift key was added to every menu shortcuts[*][b]4D & Server :[/b]A crash when dragging a field or a variable has been fixed [*][b]4D Write :[/b]Zoom issues have been fixed[*][b]4D & Server :[/b]Edit menu issue[*][b]4D & Server :[/b]There was a bug in the list editor[*][b]4D & Server :[/b]Difficulties to open a connection to a SSL site have been addressed (TCP_OPEN)[*][b]4D Insider :[/b]Listbox object method may be lost[*][b]4D View :[/b]Multi-page issue has been fixed[*][b]4D View :[/b]Sorting columns with dynamic datas was not working[*][b]4D Write :[/b]Models were not visible on server[*][b]4D Write :[/b]Zoom issue linked to some printer drivers[/list:u]


[b]Known issues[/b][list][*]In the build application dialog, adding a license is not propely displayed on the list (but properly added to the XML file)[*]Automatic data segment creation still not working with 4D server[*]Opening preferences crashes 4D client[*]Creating a new object library may crash 4D[/list:u]


[b]Most important things to have a close look at[/b][list][*]Compatibility and stability issues[*][b]Please check that the virtual structure commands are now fully compatible with the old mechanism (4D 2003 and before) For details see documentation page 23[/b][/list:u]

4D NET Center - Hosting-Center for 4th Dimension Solutions

4D NET Center is an international hosting and deployment platform for developers and web designers.

We do not develop Internet applications or solutions directly; instead we refer project requests to qualified partners. You develop mission critical solutions, and we provide the Internet hosting infrastructure.

We offer dedicated servers with preinstalled software and hosting offers for 4D Business Kit shops, Mail, and DNS Servers.

The infrastructure of the hosting center (located in Biel, Switzerland) responds to today's requirements for security and availability with everything needed to ensure the greatest possible reliability for all of the servers:

  • Internet connection to different carriers
  • two separate leased lines
  • modern routers that guarantee a maximum level of available bandwidth at all times
  • security protection devices
  • fire protection devices
  • industrial UPS system
  • comprehensive backup system

4DBK Hosting

Fast, secure and inexpensive: host your 4DBK shop or catalogue on our Xserve G5. Details...

4DBK Hosting on Mac mini

Want your own server but spend little money ? We have the perfect offer for you ! Details....

full_examples.description:
Prenons une ligne de commande 4D. Il y a un appel à une commande qui comporte des paramètres. Je souhaite extraire les paramètres. On ne peut pas se contenter de chercher le prochain point-virgule car il sera peut-être dans une chaîne ou bien dans l'appel à une fonction. En fait, il pourrait se trouver n'importe où dans des appels de fonctions imbriqués.

Le seul moyen que je vois, avec une regex, c'est la récursivité. Sinon je sais faire en pur 4D.

Le motif que j'ai est :
(?:\(|;)(?P<param>("([^"]|\\")*(?<!\\)"|[^;\(\)"]|\((?P=param);?\)|\{(?P=param)\}|≤(?P=param)≥)+)(?:;|\))
Attention, il n'est pas 4D ready

Je l'ai testé sur regex101. Il fonctionne bien.
